title: League Wont Load
body: Ok, so i am on the new client and whenever i open the new client what happens is that it wont load. It stays in the loading screen with the blue circle circling the big L. If you have a solution please help me.

replies.body: We typically see this if your connection to the patching services keeps dropping out. You should be able to resolve this by configuring your network settings according to our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) If you continue to see issues after taking those steps, let me know so we can continue troubleshooting this together.
Thank yu so much this has helped me tremendously
It worked twice but now I'm having the same problem again.

And nothing was changed back (i.e. turning your AV or Firewall back on, swapping back over to WiFi, etc) from the configurations you made following the guide? Are you seeing the same behavior or is something else happening?
